pullrequest.title: Some protobuf to sdf conversion code needed by model editor

content.raw:
ya ideally we add them in as well. At the moment I output the warning message below to let users know they are not yet implemented.

I've been adding these conversion functions whenever I needed them. These function may eventually replaced by the new method described in the [gazebo design document](#!/osrf/gazebo_design/pull-request/10/add-design-doc-for-converting-protobuf/diff) so I did not implement everything.

We could mark the current `LinkToSDF` function as `\internal` in doxygen to warn users not to rely on them?
content.html:
ya ideally we add them in as well. At the moment I output the warning message below to let users know they are not yet implemented.

I've been adding these conversion functions whenever I needed them. These function may eventually replaced by the new method described in the gazebo design document so I did not implement everything.

We could mark the current LinkToSDF function as \internal in doxygen to warn users not to rely on them?
